name: Catch The Head - Collector's Edition Upgrade
detailed_description:
Collector's edition features the game's soundtrack and 40 desktop themes of 4K character renders.

  • 32 tracks. Duration: 110 minutes

Music by: George Karagioules, Red-Line, Magic Mizrahi and Mobthrow.
Available in .wav and .mp3 formats.

Track LIst:
01 - Artemis & the Sharks - Condemned To Hell -- 03:27
02 - Artemis & the Sharks - In the Underworld -- 03:45
03 - Artemis & the Sharks - Funny Love -- 03:55
04 - Artemis & the Sharks - Broken Love -- 04:19
05 - Artemis & the Sharks - Busy Man -- 03:22
06 - Artemis & the Sharks - Dont Give Up -- 03:39
07 - Red-Line - Out of Business -- 04:45
08 - Red-Line - T.S.P -- 04:34
09 - Magic Mizrahi - Acid Warriors -- 07:38
10 - Magic Mizrahi - Shiva -- 06:43
11 - Mobthrow - Deathstep -- 06:13
12 - Scarlet Heights Outer rim -- 03:02
13 - Scarlet Heights Sub level -- 06:05
14 - Scarlet Heights Vrachos -- 03:00
15 - Lily's home -- 04:06
16 - Blackwell School -- 03:14
17 - Silverwood Hospital -- 03:27
18 - Castle outer region -- 02:10
19 - Castle basement -- 02:16
20 - Castle inner core -- 02:17
21 - Ground Zero -- 02:48
22 - Ship Bay -- 02:06
23 - Piranha -- 02:20
24 - Cult of Shadows Temple -- 01:57
25 - The monastery -- 03:26
26 - The path to Ascension -- 03:06
27 - Above the sky -- 02:54
28 - Meeting place -- 02:40
29 - The last Trial -- 01:41
30 - control room -- 02:48
31 - main menu -- 00:37
32 - game over -- 01:04

  • Desktop art

40 desktop renders in 4K resolution from all game's characters
All material is located in "Collector's Edition Content" folder inside the game's install location.

short_description: Catch The Head collector's edition includes the game's soundtrack and artwork.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 | AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game has traps that make the player's character get injured or killed throughout the game. Blood is shown.
